name: Warm Sunset Palette
description: Warm oranges and yellows creating vibrant, energetic, and optimistic atmosphere

prompt.base: Warm sunset color palette, vibrant oranges and yellows, golden tones, warm color scheme, sunset hues, energetic colors, optimistic palette, fiery warmth
prompt.positive: warm sunset colors, vibrant orange (#FF6B35), golden yellow (#FDC830), amber tones (#F7931E), warm palette, sunset hues, energetic colors, optimistic atmosphere, fiery warmth, golden glow, warm color harmony
prompt.negative: cool colors, blues, greens, cold palette, muted tones, desaturated colors, monochrome, dark palette

technical.use_cases: Energetic scenes, optimistic moods, summer atmospheres, warm environments

variations.name: Tropical Sunset
variations.modifier: intense oranges, tropical warmth, beach atmosphere, vacation vibes, exotic warmth

variations.name: Desert Sunset
variations.modifier: dusty oranges, arid warmth, desert tones, dry heat atmosphere, southwestern palette

variations.name: Autumn Sunset
variations.modifier: burnt oranges, fall colors, harvest tones, seasonal warmth, rustic palette

examples: A landscape bathed in warm sunset colors, vibrant oranges and yellows, golden atmosphere
An interior with warm sunset palette, energetic orange accents, optimistic yellow tones
